page.title: 03GENERAL INTRODUCTION FAWKHAM
page.content: One important development is Fawkham Manor Medical Clinic, another at White House Farm a small packaging manufacturing and distribution centre. Two new Leisure Centres have been developed one private recreation club Fredericks near the Brands Hatch Hotel is widely known and patronised but very expensive. The other Leisure Centre at Gay Dawn Farm is also private much less expensive. Other developments are a new equestrian centre for dressage, dog breeding and greyhound racing kennels, and a mushroom farm. There is no railway only transport is a small private bus running daily through the vaey via the Dartford Tunnel into Essex.The Parish has a small population one notable is the Master of West Kent Hung - the hunt meets at the hostelry three times per year and on Boxing Day morn is a very fine sight to see.
